CustomField.description: An indicator of a specific salary within a grade, level, class, rate, or pay band. Each grade has 10 step rates (steps 1-10) that are each worth approximately 3 percent of the employee’s salary; https://dw.opm.gov/datastandards/dataStandard/1576?index=S
CustomField.inlineHelpText: An indicator of a specific salary within a grade, level, class, rate, or pay band. Each grade has 10 step rates (steps 1-10) that are each worth approximately 3 percent of the employee’s salary; https://dw.opm.gov/datastandards/dataStandard/1576?index=S
CustomField.label: Step or Rate (Current)
